sentences.sContent: Please fill in the names of the addressor and the addressee.
sentences.sContent_eng: Please fill in the names of the addressor and the addressee.
sentences.sCn: 请填写收信人和寄信人的姓名。

sentences.sContent: One day, the father lets eight year-old son send a letter, the son took the letter , the father then remembered didn't write the address and addressee's name on the envelope.
sentences.sContent_eng: One day, the father lets eight year-old son send a letter, the son took the letter , the father then remembered didn't write the address and addressee's name on the envelope.
sentences.sCn: 有一天，父亲让八岁的儿子去寄一封信，儿子已经拿着信跑了，父亲才想起信封上没写地址和收信人的名字。

sentences.sContent: You may send gift packages--excepting alcohol, tobacco, or perfume--worth more than $500(USD) from a CBI country to the United States duty-free, with a limit of one parcel per addressee per day.
sentences.sContent_eng: You may send gift packages--excepting alcohol, tobacco, or perfume--worth more than $500(USD) from a CBI country to the United States duty-free, with a limit of one parcel per addressee per day.
sentences.sCn: 您可以发送礼品包-除了酒精，烟草，或香水-总价值超果500美元（美元）从英果工业联合会的果家向美果免税，并限制每一个包裹收件人每天。

synos.tran: [邮]收件人，收信人；[计]被访地址

words.tran: 地址；演讲；致辞；说话的技巧
演说；从事；忙于；写姓名地址；向…致辞

trans.tranOther: the person a letter, package etc is addressed to
